creditline: Gift of Yang and Helen H. Wang
description: figure at left wearing turquoise robes, with a blue-grey headscarf patterned with gold, holds a bouquet of pink peonies; figure at center wears green robe with gold swirled designs and holds a kettle in his PL hand, with a grey cat perched on the back of his neck; taller bald man at right wearing tan robes and holding a red staff with gold paddle-like ends
title: Arhats, from an album of paintings
